metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Folsom Prison Blues is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Folsom Prison Blues has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Major,  and F Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
